sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛...➛Name,

Adoption application Trigger➛...➛Number for Trigger➛...➛Name has been submitted.

 

Pick up date is scheduled for:

 Trigger➛...➛Pickup Date

 

Please look out for an update to the status of your application.

 

Sincerely,

Thomas - Director of Animal Shelter
